title: Affordable Living, 55+ Active Senior Community!! CALL NOW!!!
posting_body: Come in and make yourself at home here at The Reserve at Everett!
To schedule a tour you can give us a call at
show contact info
Property Description:
Affordability, Convenient, and Beautiful senior apartment community for those age 55+.
With an abundance of amenities and comfortable floor plans that make you feel cozy and ready to settle in right at home.
Located in Everett, Washington - The Reserve at Everett offers studio, one and two-bedroom apartment homes featuring well designed floor plans with you in mind.
Catch a tv show in our tv room or come have some fun with one of our many other activities throughout our main floor.
Enjoy the sunset, sunrise or just the gorgeous day in our sun room or come on in and take a peek at our state-of-the-art fitness center.
Just minutes away from shopping, restaurants and easy access to Interstate 5 and the bus line.
Take it from us, YOU WILL LOVE IT HERE!
The Reserve at Everett is limited to those that meet the age restrictions and meet the following income criteria:
*Applicants must be at least age 55.*
Annual Household Income Limits (Gross):
** Income Restrictions**
(Subject to change without notice)
Office Hours: Monday-Friday: 9:00 am-5:00 pm, with Saturday/Sunday: Closed
Scheduling a tour is quick and easy give us a call!!
Details:
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs
Pet notes: Dogs Allowed (Breed restrictions do apply) •$300
Pet Deposit •$25
Monthly Pet Rent (Per pet) 2 Pets Max per household
Deposit: $300.00 (or up to a month’s rent depending on credit)
Application fee: $17 per adult
Amenities
Included in Rent: Water, Sewage, Garbage
Laundry:
Each apartment home has a washer/dryer
Parking type: Garage, covered and non-covered
Appliances: Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Microwave, Range/Oven
Facilities and Recreation: Fitness center, Business center/Library room, Media Room, Game Room, Community Room, Sun room
Access: Elevator, Controlled access, Emergency Entrance
Additional features: Non-Smoking Property
